80587.affected_area: Invermere, Windermere, Fairmont Hot Springs, Radium Hot Springs
80587.summary: Some customers in Invermere, Windermere, Fairmont Hot Springs and Radium Hot Springs are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
